H0.text: Which duo wrote the UK television series ‘Dad’s Army’. Jimmy Perry and David Croft

H1.text: Which duo wrote the UK television series ‘Dad’s Army’. Richard Curtis and John Cleese

H2.text: Which duo wrote the UK television series ‘Dad’s Army’. Galton and Simpson

H3.text: Which duo wrote the UK television series ‘Dad’s Army’. David Sharland

A4.text: He devised and co-wrote the BBC sitcoms Dad's Army (1968–1977), It Ain't Half Hot Mum (1974–1981), Hi-de-Hi! (1980–1988) and You Rang, M'Lord? (1988–1993), all with David Croft.
